snippet: The woman whose brutal attack shocked India had been the hope of her family, and an example of social and economic mobility in a changing nation.
abstract: Family of Indian woman who died after being gang-raped on a moving bus in New Delhi had been the pride of her family, and an example of how far ambition, hard work and parental love can remove one generation from rural poverty.

byline.original: By HEATHER TIMMONS and HARI KUMAR
byline.contributor: Anjani Trivedi and Niharika Mandhana contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The woman whose brutal attack shocked India had been the hope of her family, and an example of social and economic mobility in a changing nation.

headline.seo: For India Rape Victim’s Family, Layers of Loss
headline.main: For India Rape Victim’s Family, Many Layers of Loss
headline.print_headline: For India Rape Victim’s Family, Many Layers of Loss
